additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Active ingredients Homosalate 8.00% w/w, Octocrylene 6.00% w/w, Octyl Salicylate 5.00% w/w, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane 3.00% w/w, 4-Methylbenzyldiene Camphor 2.50% w/w. Preservatives Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxybenzoates.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: WARNING Avoid contact with eyes. Test on small area of skin. If irritation occurs discontinue use. Do not use on broken, damaged or diseased skin. Do not expose babies less than 6 months old to the sun. Avoid prolonged sun exposure. Wear protective clothing, hats & eyewear when exposed to the sun.

description: This lotion is very high protection sunscreen providing broad spectrum protection against premature skin-aging UVA rays and burning UVB rays with coconut fragrance. 4 Hours Water Resistant, Non-Greasy, Sweat Resistant. Free From Oxybenzone, Against Animal Testing, Australian Made
name: SPF 50+ Coconut Lotion
